trans-unit.source: Decodes handles and arguments, then queues handles and stores arguments in the class property $args. For example in extending classes, $args is appended to the item url as a query string. Note $args is NOT the $args property of items in the $registered array.
trans-unit.target: 解码句柄和参数,然后将句柄排队并将参数存储在类属性$args中。例如,在扩展类中,$args作为一个查询字符串被附加到项目url中。注意$args不是$registered数组中项目的$args属性。

trans-unit.source: Disables autocomplete on the ‘post’ form (Add/Edit Post screens) for WebKit browsers, as they disregard the autocomplete setting on the editor textarea. That can break the editor when the user navigates to it with the browser’s Back button. See #28037

trans-unit.source: Discards expired events, and makes WordCamps "sticky." Attendees need more advanced notice about WordCamps than they do for meetups, so camps should appear in the list sooner. If a WordCamp is coming up, the API will "stick" it in the response, even if it wouldn’t otherwise appear. When that happens, the event will be at the end of the list, and will need to be moved into a higher position, so that it doesn’t get trimmed off.
trans-unit.target: 丢弃过期的事件，并使WordCamps“具有粘性”。与聚会相比，与会者需要更高级的WordCamp通知，因此营地应尽快出现在列表中。如果出现WordCamp，则API会在响应中“粘贴”它，即使它不会出现。发生这种情况时，该事件将位于列表的末尾，并且需要将其移至更高的位置，以免被裁剪。
